# numeric

**Type Property**

A style that uses a numeric style to describe relative dates, such as “1 day ago” or “in 3 weeks”.

## Declaration

```swift
static var numeric: Date.RelativeFormatStyle.Presentation { get }
```

## Modifying Relative Date Style Presentations

- **named**: A style that uses named styles to describe relative dates, such as “yesterday”, “last week”, or “next week”.

items.description: A style that uses named styles to describe relative dates, such as “yesterday”, “last week”, or “next week”.
